description:
Founded in 1991 by attorney Albert Salvi, the law firm of Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., is a leading personal injury firm serving the people of Northern Illinois. From our law office in Chicago, which is one of our four office locations in the area, we proudly assist the people of Lake, Cook, McHenry, Kane, Kendall and Will counties who know to turn to us for help after suffering injuries or losses due to the following:

• Workplace accidents

• Wrongful death in the workplace

Our Chicago office is our Workers' Compensation office run by attorney George Tamvakis, a leader in workers' compensation law.

Our law firm is home to four experienced attorneys, Albert Salvi, Michael Maher, Kathy Salvi and George Tamvakis, who have over 115 years of combined legal experience. In addition to their experience, our attorneys also have the respect of the legal community because of their record of success, which includes a number of multimillion-dollar verdicts, and their dedication to our firm's clients.

If you or someone you love suffered injuries because another individual, professional or business acted negligently, the attorneys at the law firm of Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., can help you pursue compensation for the associated losses. During a free initial consultation, you can discuss your case with one of our attorneys and find out if you are eligible for a personal injury or wrongful death claim.
